text: Unham musarakam (raba de sarika thahira'una vale) de la'i alaha ate unham de rasulam nala samajhauta kivem hom sakada hai, paratu jinham lokam nala tusim samajhauta kita si masajida-e-harama (ka'aba) de nere, isa la'i jadom taka uha tuhade nala thika rahina tusim' vi unham nala thika raho besaka alaha sadacari'am nu pasada karada hai
